listAllPlayers: SELECT p.nom_perso AS nom, p.id_perso AS matricule, p.clan AS camp, tu.nom_unite AS 'type', p.bataillon AS bataillon, g.nom_grade AS grade FROM perso p LEFT JOIN perso_as_grade pag ON pag.id_perso = p.id_perso LEFT JOIN grades g ON g.id_grade = pag.id_grade LEFT JOIN type_unite tu ON p.type_perso = tu.id_unite
listAllPlayersSideCharts: SELECT count(*) AS compte, p.clan AS camp FROM perso p WHERE p.bataillon NOT IN ('Général de l''Union', 'Général du Sud') AND p.DLA_perso > NOW() - INTERVAL ? DAY GROUP BY p.clan ORDER BY p.clan
listAllPlayersGrouillotCharts: SELECT count(*) AS compte, p.clan AS camp, tu.nom_unite AS 'type' FROM perso p LEFT JOIN type_unite tu ON p.type_perso = tu.id_unite WHERE p.bataillon NOT IN ('Général de l''Union', 'Général du Sud') AND p.DLA_perso > NOW() - INTERVAL ? DAY GROUP BY p.clan, tu.nom_unite
listAllPlayersGradeCharts: SELECT count(*) AS compte, p.clan AS camp, g.nom_grade AS 'grade' FROM perso p LEFT JOIN perso_as_grade pag ON pag.id_perso = p.id_perso LEFT JOIN grades g on pag.id_grade = g.id_grade LEFT JOIN type_unite tu on tu.id_unite = p.type_perso WHERE tu.nom_unite = 'Chef' AND p.DLA_perso > NOW() - INTERVAL ? DAY AND p.bataillon NOT IN ('Général de l''Union', 'Général du Sud') GROUP BY p.clan, g.nom_grade ORDER by g.pc_grade
listAllPgCharts: SELECT sum(g.point_armee_grade) AS compte, p.clan AS camp FROM perso p LEFT JOIN perso_as_grade pag ON pag.id_perso = p.id_perso LEFT JOIN grades g on g.id_grade = pag.id_grade WHERE p.bataillon NOT IN ('Général de l''Union', 'Général du Sud') AND p.DLA_perso > NOW() - INTERVAL ? DAY GROUP BY p.clan ORDER BY p.clan
listAllArmes: SELECT SUM(pourcentage)/ count(pourcentage) AS 'precision', SUM(degats)/count(degats) AS degats, count(pourcentage) AS attaques, a.nom_arme AS arme, p.clan AS camp FROM log l LEFT JOIN arme a ON a.id_arme = l.id_arme JOIN perso p ON p.id_perso = l.id_perso WHERE type_action like 'attaque%' AND p.id_perso < 50000 GROUP BY l.id_arme, p.clan
